template.name: odoo_form
template.value: <record id="" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="model"></field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string=""> <sheet> <group> <field name="name"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>
template.description: Create Form View

template.name: odoo_tree
template.value: <record id="" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="model"></field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree string=""> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>
template.description: Create Tree View

template.name: odoo_data
template.description: Create the main tags

template.name: odoo_form_inherit
template.value:
<!-- Inherit Form View to Modify it --> <record id="" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="model"></field> <field name="inherit_id" ref=""/> <field name="arch" type="xml">
<xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position=""> <!-- Add your fields or attributes here --> </xpath>
</field> </record>
template.description: Inherit Existing Form View

template.name: odoo_tree_inherit
template.value:
<record id="" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="model"></field> <field name="inherit_id" ref=""/> <field name="arch" type="xml">
<xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position=""> <!-- Add new fields here --> </xpath>
</field> </record>
template.description: Inherit Existing Tree View

template.name: odoo_view_action
template.value: ir.actions.act_window tree,form
template.description: Create new Action

template.name: odoo_menuitem_root
template.value: <!-- This Menu Item will appear in the Upper bar, That's why It needs NO parent or action --> <menuitem id="MODULE_NAME_root" name="" sequence=""/>
template.description: Create New Menu Item in the Upper bar

template.name: odoo_menuitem_categ
template.value: <!-- This Menu Item Must have a parent --> <menuitem id="UNIQUE_ID_categ" name="" parent="" sequence=""/>
template.description: Create New Menu Item for Categroization

template.name: odoo_menuitem_action
template.value: <!-- This Menu Item must have a parent and an action --> <menuitem id="UNIQUE_ID_categ" name="" parent="" action="" sequence=""/>
template.description: Create New Menu Item for Actions

template.name: odoo_nested_group
template.description: Create Nested Groups

template.name: odoo_domain
template.description: Add domain to your field

template.name: odoo_object
template.description: Create New Odoo Object

template.name: odoo_field_integer
template.description: Add new field of type Integer

template.name: odoo_field_char
template.description: Add new field of type Char

template.name: odoo_field_text
template.description: Add new field of type Text

template.name: odoo_field_many2one
template.description: Add new field of type Many2one

template.name: odoo_field_one2many
template.description: Add new field of type One2many

template.name: odoo_field_boolean
template.description: Add new field of type Boolean

template.name: odoo_field_html
template.description: Add new field of type HTML

template.name: odoo_field_float
template.description: Add new field of type Float

template.name: odoo_field_date
template.description: Add new field of type Date

template.name: odoo_field_datetime
template.description: Add new field of type DateTime

template.name: odoo_field_selection
template.description: Add new field of type Selection

template.name: odoo_field_many2many
template.value: new_field_ids = fields.Many2many(comodel_name="", relation="", column1="", column2="", string="", )
template.description: Add new field of type Many2many

template.name: odoo_object_inherit
template.description: Inherit/Extend Existing Odoo Object

template.name: odoo_security_category
template.description: Add new Security Category

template.name: odoo_security_group
template.value: <record id="" model="res.groups"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="category_id" ref=""/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> </record>
template.description: Create new Group, then assign new permissions

template.name: odoo_security_rule
template.value: <record id="" model="ir.rule"> <field name="name"></field> <field ref="model_name_of_model" name="model_id"/> <field name="domain_force">[('', '', )]</field> <field name="perm_write" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="1"/> <!-- You can attach this rule to a specific group, Or make it Global --> <field name="groups" eval="[(4, ref('group_id'))]"/> <!--<field name="global" eval="1"/> --> </record>
template.description: Create new Security Rules

template.name: odoo_notebook
template.description: Add Notebook and a page

template.name: odoo_page
template.description: Add new page

template.name: odoo_field_binary
template.description: Add new field of type Binary

template.name: odoo_wkf
template.description: Add Workflow

template.name: odoo_wkf_transition
template.value: <record id="" model="workflow.transition"> <field name="act_from" ref=""/> <field name="act_to" ref=""/> <field name="signal"></field> </record>
template.description: Add new Transition to an existing Workflow

template.name: odoo_wkf_activity
template.value: <record id="" model="workflow.activity"> <field name="wkf_id" ref=""/> <!--<field name="flow_start">True</field>--> <!--<field name="flow_stop">True</field>--> <field name="name"></field> <field name="kind">function</field> <field name="action">METHOD_NAME()</field> </record>
template.description: Add new Activity

template.name: odoo_form_header
template.value: <header> <button name="" string="" class="oe_highlight" states="" type=""/> <field name="state" widget="statusbar" statusbar_visible="" statusbar_colors="{'KEY_IS_STATE':'VALUE_IS_COLOR'}"/> </header>
template.description: Add Form's header with 'state' and buttons

template.name: odoo_form_social
template.description: Add Social Messaging and followers.
